snippet: An investigation that experts say could last months will focus on the engine fire that knocked out power and plumbing for the Carnival cruise ship Triumph.
abstract: Most of 4,200 passengers and crew members finally reach their homes after five days aboard malfunctioning Carnival cruise ship Triumph; Carnival Cruise Lines hauls boat to shipyard to begin mechanical investigation, which experts say could last months, to discover what caused engine fire that knocked out power and plumbing.
lead_paragraph: An investigation that experts say could last months will focus on the engine fire that knocked out power and plumbing for the Carnival cruise ship Triumph.

headline.seo: Carnival Ship Triumph’s Passengers Departed, It Heads Toward Inspection
headline.main: Its Passengers Departed, Cruise Ship to Undergo Inspection
headline.print_headline: Its Passengers Departed, Cruise Ship to Undergo Inspection
